keyword: how many calories are in a russet potato
title: How Many Calories Are in a Russet Potato?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a russet potato, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown for one medium baked potato.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Russet Potato?
assumptions: Medium size (173 g), baked with skin, no added fats, salt, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, cooking method, and additions like butter or cheese. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium baked russet potato provides ~161 kcal and ~4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a russet potato?
faqs.a: About 161 kcal for one medium baked russet potato with skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a russet potato?
faqs.a: Approximately 37 g carbs, including 4.4 g fiber, per medium potato.

faqs.q: Is a russet potato low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.2 g fat per medium potato, making it a healthy carb source.

faqs.q: How does potato size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller potatoes (~130 g) have ~120 kcal; larger (~299 g) up to 278 kcal.

faqs.q: Are russet potatoes good for baking?
faqs.a: Yes, their high starch content makes them ideal for fluffy baked potatoes.
